remarks: A linear operator is Hermitian if ` x .ih ( T `` x ) ` takes only real values.  Remark in [ReedSimon] p. 195.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnophm.1 $e |- T e. LinOp $.
lnophm.2 $e |- A. x e. ~H ( x .ih ( T ` x ) ) e. RR $.
lnophmi $p |- T e. HrmOp $.
$d T x $.
